Name: Wizhood: The Epic of Freedom
About the game: He was a king who ruled his kingdom with peace justice and prosperity. People in luxury, everyone happy. But there was something reckoned without... ...Gorolks who ended great empires... May you be nightmare of your foes with Umlenor's wand and iron fist! Upgrade your charater with soul points and face the enemy stronger! Game Traits 15 Types Of Traps legendary Soundtrack 22 Levels 20 Achievements staf and Character Upgrade System 2 Bosses Enjoy An Adventrue-like story!
